LanguageData.Turret_Maxim.label: Maxim machine gun
LanguageData.Turret_Maxim.description: A heavy machine gun. uses 7.62mm machine gun ammo.leaves gun crates when deconstructed. Must be maned.
LanguageData.Artillery_Maxim.label: Maxim
LanguageData.Turret_QuadMaxim.label: Quad Maxim
LanguageData.Turret_QuadMaxim.description: A quadruple machine gun. leaves gun crates when deconstructed. Must be manned.
LanguageData.Artillery_QuadMaxim.label: Quad Maxim
LanguageData.Artillery_QuadMaxim.description: quadruple 7.62mm machine gun. leaves gun crates when deconstructed.
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Maxim.label: Maxim machine gun crate
LanguageData.AAA_Crate_Maxim.description: 7.62mm maxim machine gun. This is too heavy to hold. you need to make a turret for this.
